item.title: RT by @laurentgarnier: It’s with great pleasure that I get to announce, my brother @laurentgarnier is coming to FURTHER. This’ll be 1 of the most inspiring events we’ve done. Join us August 6 at @Radionamsterdam . You won’t want to miss this 1! 💪🏾🤎 Early bird tix: https://radionamsterdam.stager.nl/web/tickets/111173620
item.dc:creator: @djbone313
item.description:

item.title:
RT by @laurentgarnier: Just announced... @laurentgarnier : Off The Record on Friday 15 July. This inspiring, generational documentary explores the birth and rise of techno music through the eyes of one of its pioneers: acclaimed French DJ Laurent Garnier.
Tickets on sale now: http://ow.ly/8JfF50JCwG1
item.dc:creator: @CinemaCityNrw
item.description:
Just announced... @laurentgarnier : Off The Record on Friday 15 July.
This inspiring, generational documentary explores the birth and rise of techno music through the eyes of one of its pioneers: acclaimed French DJ Laurent Garnier.

Tickets on sale now: ow.ly/8JfF50JCwG1

item.title: RT by @laurentgarnier: We are thrilled to host the official afterparty for the new Laurent Garnier documentary on 9th July in collaboration with @docnrollfest and @BFI - it runs from 10pm - 2am. DJs are @worksofintent and a VERY special guest https://ra.co/events/1540055
item.dc:creator: @spiritland

item.title: RT by @laurentgarnier: Tap into the French Alps and join @anderssicre & @laurentgarnier from 12:00 BST 🏔 Today's show was recorded in La Clusaz during the 15th anniversary of @radiomeuh Circus Festival. Join them in their celebrations over at → http://wrldwd.fm/anders1404
item.dc:creator: @worldwidefm

item.title: RT by @laurentgarnier: As well as including 40 mins of pure PSB disco chat, this month’s @worldwidefm show is also very much inspired by Paris and French touch productions. Blame a two hour conversation with @edbangerrecords and @gabrielszatan and listen out for jams from @laurentgarnier and @MydSound
item.dc:creator: @RalphusMoorus

item.dc:creator: @EPM_Music
item.description:
The one and only @laurentgarnier drops the first of five EPs today this time exclusively on #Junodownload. The Cod3 QR #LabelTakeover features an interview, Laurent’s Top 10 ‘Most Wanted', two brand new tracks and DJ mix! 🇫🇷♥️▶️
junodownload.com/laurent-gar…
@junodownload @ScanXmusic

item.title:
RT by @laurentgarnier: [LAURENT GARNIER : OFF THE RECORD]
Découvrez « Laurent Garnier : Off The Record », un film de Gabin Rivoire, qui retrace les trente ans de carrière du DJ @laurentgarnier. Projection suivie d’une rencontre avec l’équipe du film.
Inscriptions 👉 https://link.dice.fm/gfbbdbb6f57d
item.dc:creator: @Gro_ndControl
item.description:
[LAURENT GARNIER : OFF THE RECORD]

Découvrez « Laurent Garnier : Off The Record », un film de Gabin Rivoire, qui retrace les trente ans de carrière du DJ @laurentgarnier. Projection suivie d’une rencontre avec l’équipe du film.

Inscriptions

item.title: RT by @laurentgarnier: Catch me live from @gaitelyrique on april 6th with Pedro Winter, @laurentgarnier, Pablo Bozzi, @jennifercardini, @thehacker and more... All donations will go to Ukraine 🇺🇦. Call for donations already open on https://www.arte.tv/sites/corporate/faq/aider-lukraine/ @ARTEconcertFR
item.dc:creator: @VITALICOFFICIAL

item.title:
RT by @laurentgarnier: Ukraine latest:
• @ARTEconcertFR is hosting a livestream at Paris's @gaitelyrique tonight with @jennifercardini, @laurentgarnier and others • @Youandewan's Small Hours label has released a 45-track compilation featuring Junes, Sweely, Huerta and more https://ra.co/news/76872
item.dc:creator: @residentadvisor
item.description:
Ukraine latest:

• @ARTEconcertFR is hosting a livestream at Paris's @gaitelyrique tonight with @jennifercardini, @laurentgarnier and others
• @Youandewan's Small Hours label has released a 45-track compilation featuring Junes, Sweely, Huerta and more ra.co/news/76872
